events.name: forging.started
events.description: Emitted when the current delegate starts forging.

events.name: forging.stopped
events.description: Emitted when the current delegate stops forging.

events.name: forging.missing
events.description: Emitted when the current delegate is missing blocks.

events.name: forging.success
events.description: Emitted when the current delegate forged a block.

events.name: block.removed
events.description: Emitted when a blocks is removed.

events.name: transaction.created
events.description: Emitted when a transaction is created.

events.name: transaction.removed
events.description: Emitted when a transaction is removed.

events.name: vote.created
events.description: Emitted when a vote is created.

events.name: vote.removed
events.description: Emitted when a vote is removed.
